BulkTitleAvailable.message: Bulk search is only available to premium users

alreadySavedProspectText.message: Click on their profile to see all the data you collected or click Save to save this prospect to another list.

appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.
appDesc.message: Find email addresses on any website. Our Email Finder lets you collect leads and grow sales on the go.

appName.description: Maximum of 45 characters. The title of the application, displayed in the web store and in install dialog.

appShortName.description: Maximum of 12 characters recommended. Is a short version of the app's name.

collectContactsWebsite.message: Collect contacts from any website you visit

collectingProspectsText.message: Don't close the window until all prospects are saved.

deletedProfile.message: This profile can not be saved due to owner's request

doesntWorkOnLiText.message: Check out other Snov.io extensions to find your perfect lead!

errorSaveTwitter.message: Unable to save the prospect. Log out of Twitter and try again.

f5.message: Please try refreshing the page in your browser

getRelevantEmails.message: Get relevant emails from Google search results

googleText.message: Find leads in bulk on Google search results

logInAlertText.message:

loginToTwitterText.message: To collect prospects, please log into your account.

messageForFreeUser.message: Unlock bulk search and collect thousands more leads!

newVersion_message.message: A new updated version of Snov.io Email Finder is already available. Download now.

prospectFoundText.message: Click Save to collect this prospect with data like location, job position, etc., and search for verified contact emails.

prospectSavedText.message: Click Go to list to see the data you've collected.

prospectsNotFoundText.message: There are no prospects connected to this company. Try searching for emails or collect more enriched contacts using Database Search in Snov.io web app.

rateUs_badEval.message: Thanks for your feedback! You can help us improve by sending your suggestions to help@snov.io.

rateUs_text.message: Thanks for rating us! Every day Snov.io improves with your feedback.

rateUs_title.message: How much are you enjoying Email Finder?

saveCompaniesTitle.message: Click to save selected company profiles to one of your company lists.

searchTwitter_text1.message: Type one of your target keywords (for example, person's name, job title or others) in Twitter search.

searchTwitter_text2.message: Choose People section on the results page.

searchTwitter_text3.message: Launch the extension to collect prospects in bulk.

searchingAlertTextEmails.message: We're looking for emails, this may take a moment.

searchingAlertTextProspects.message: We're looking for prospects, this may take a moment.

selectAnotherList.message: We can't find this list in your account. Please select another list and try again.

somethingWentWrongGoogleSearch.message: We couldn't collect results from this page. Please refresh the page or try another search request. If the issue persists, contact us at help@snov.io.

somethingWentWrongText.message: We couldn't collect results from this page. Please try refreshing the page or searching another profile. If the issue persists, contact us at help@snov.io.

somethingWentWrongTextShort.message: Please try refreshing the page. If the issue persists, contact us at help@snov.io.

somethingWentWrongYelp.message: We couldn't collect the results. Please try refreshing the page or contacting us at help@snov.io if the issue persists.

titleFindContacts.message: Search for employee data of selected companies

trialMessage1.message: Looks like your 30-day trial has ended today!

trialMessage2.message: You can still use the service for free or explore the full power of Snov.io with our monthly and yearly plans.

trialMessage3.message: Visit https://app.snov.io to continue with a free trial or a paid plan to boost your performance!

tryDBSearchText.message: Find prospects based on their job title, industry, company size and other filters in Snov.io web app.

tryDifferentSearch.message: Try a different Google search or find more prospects based on their job title, industry, company size and other filters with Database Search in Snov.io web app.

twitterText.message: Get emails of influencers and decision makers from their profiles

unfortunately_we_are_unable_to_provide_d.message: Unfortunately, we are unable to provide data from this company at their request.

whatAreProspectsText.message: Prospects contain verified emails, job position, location, industry and other info.

youCanLeavePage.message: You can leave the page, we've got this. You'll find the prospect in your list.
